      • describeFeatureType

        public java.lang.String describeFeatureType(de.ifgi.lod4wfs.core.GeographicLayer layer)
        Parameters:
        layer - geographic feature to be described.
        Returns:
        XML Document containing the WFS DescribeFeatureType response. Retrieves the XML Document containing the WFS DescribeFeatureType response, listing all properties related to a given feature with their data types.
        See Also:
        Specification for WFS http://www.opengeospatial.org/standards/wfs

      • getGeometriesPredicates

        Parameters:
        layer - geographic feature
        Returns:
        Lists all predicates (properties) related to a given feature.

      • getFeature

        public java.lang.String getFeature(de.ifgi.lod4wfs.core.GeographicLayer layer)
        Parameters:
        layer - geographic feature to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        XML Document containing the WFS GetFeature response with all geometries of a given feature together with their attribute table.
        See Also:
        Specification for WFS http://www.opengeospatial.org/standards/wfs
